DOC.brief_summary: The study Phase Ib , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled , multiple-dose ( 7 day ) , dose-escalation study assess safety , pharmacodynamics , pharmacokinetics intravenous Imprime PGG™ Injection healthy adult subject .
DOC.brief_title: Multiple-Dose , Dose-Escalation Safety , Pharmacodynamics , Pharmacokinetics Study Imprime PGG™ Injection
DOC.criteria: 1 . Be age 18 45 year , inclusive 2 . Have body weight 45 125 kg , inclusive , body mass index less equal 30 kg/m2 3 . If female , nonpregnant nonnursing , premenopausal , negative serum pregnancy test confirm prior enrollment practice least two method birth control 4 . Be healthy determine investigator basis medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , clinical laboratory test result 5 . Have ability understand requirement study , provide write informed consent , agree abide study restriction return require assessment 6 . Have provide write authorization use disclosure protect health information 1 . Have know hypersensitivity baker 's yeast 2 . Have history tobacco use within 3 month first day screen 3 . Be know suspected abuser alcohol drugs/substances abuse anytime 4 . Have active yeast infection 5 . Have positive hepatitis B , hepatitis C , human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) test conduct part screen 6 . Except otherwise indicate , take prescription medication within 30 day last day screen ( Day 1 ) overthecounter medication , herbal preparation , vitamin within 7 day last day screen ( Day 1 ) ; follow medication exempt criterion : acetaminophen [ maximum 3 g/day ] , female hormone replacement therapy , oral contraceptive 7 . Have participate investigational drug study within 30 day five half life ( whichever longer ) last day screen ( Day 1 ) ever participate study Imprime PGG Betafectin 8 . Have donate lose unit blood within 30 day last day screen ( Day 1 ) 9 . Have clinical condition , opinion principal investigator , warrant exclusion study scientific , procedural , safety perspective
